scripts.client-build: cd client && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.server-build: cd server && npm ci --dev && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.existing-build-remove: cd server && cd dist && rm -rf build && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.croud-prebuild: npm run existing-build-remove && npm run client-build && npm run server-build && mv ./client/build ./server/dist/
